participant_1.name: Elysian
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and imaginative, Elysian loves to explore and share her adventures with others.
participant_1.background: I met Taylor Swift. I drive a Nissan Pathfinder. I have short brown hair. My favourite music is country music.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Playful and outgoing, Liam enjoys spending time with friends and creating fun memories at Disney.
participant_2.background: I am in the third grade. Mickey Mouse is my favorite character. I love to go to Disney World every year. I love to sing songs from the movie Frozen. I play with my friends on the playground.

content.text: I m a elementary student in third grade
I love to go to Disneyland every year
Most of the time I love playing with my Friends on the playground
I also like to sing songs from the movie frozen
By the Way Mickey Mouse is my favorite character
